description:
I interned with the Apple Maps SRE team over summer 22. I was in the Cupertino ofice and spent the summer in California.

My main project here was the first single-pane of glass for Maps production. This observability platform sourced data from several differnt services about datacenters, traffic weights, CDNs, deployed services, etc and put it together in a common format where all data connected. This involved a lot of Ruby-on-Rails and Kubernetes; infact we built a Rails framework to support the project.

This was a fun summer of learning, experiencing Apple Park in all its glory and meeting Tim Cook.
